channel.title: Cant play a downloaded server
channel.description:
why is that i can play real rs, wow, eudemons, and webclients of private servers for rs but if i download one and run it i cant play it and i used to b able to
i can run 7 accts on real rs at one time of course with multi tabs so i dont beilive its my internet but far as my computer goes i have
vista 64 bit 8 gig memory 683 gig hard drive
i have formatted my computer reinstalled all my drivers and still cant play a downloaded server i have downloaded over a dosen of them
can someone plz tell me what i can do to fix this
this is what happens i can start server log into game but when i walk 1 time its ok if i click on somthing or try walk 2nd time game window and cmd window close automaticly

item.title: Cant play a downloaded server
item.dc:creator: @imsokool22 imsokool22
item.description:
@imsokool22 wrote:

hmm i dont know then u did something wrong make sure they dont say “64 bit” next to them or they dont work!!!those r for Program Files\ we need the ones for program files(x86)

Read full topic

item.title: Cant play a downloaded server
item.dc:creator: @kingcurt kingcurt
item.description:
@kingcurt wrote:

ok i have uninstalled all my java and reinstalled made sure all was 64 bit and yes i have jdk and jre both are update 17 and i reinstalled them too. now for the set-up on enviromental tables i dont think i know what u mean can u tell me how to do that?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 10, 2010, 10:16:33 am[/size][hr]and yes i did try to play again still same thing lets me log n then walk 2 times and it automaticaly closes window i can talk and stay loged n as long as i dont click 2 times inside the game

Read full topic

item.title: Cant play a downloaded server
item.dc:creator: @imsokool22 imsokool22
item.description:
@imsokool22 wrote:

ok to ask did you install jdk from the java website yet? either that or you didnt set-up your enviromental tables ok and make sure you java doesnt have the x32 in it or it wont work.

Read full topic
